attributes.action: Declare that Gordon Brown has insufficient support from the electorate to be a successful Leader of the Labour Party and Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although Gordon Brown appears to be the overwhelming favourite to become the next Prime Minister I am yet to meet a single person who thinks that he would be a good candidate to fill the position. It is a disgrace that our Prime Minister should be installed without a mandate from the electorate.
